headline.main: ALLIED BLOWS HIT FOE IN NEW GUINEA; MacArthur's Fliers and Ground Forces Step Up Attacks on Japanese in Papua

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, Monday, Aug. 3 (AP) -- Allied planes shot down six Japanese aircraft over the Kokoda-Gona area of Southeastern New Guinea yesterday as cooperating Allied ground patrols dispersed Japanese outpost groups in a jungle fight near Kokoda, it was announced officially today. Three Allied planes were reported missing.
abstract: air reconnaissance unit downs Jap plane over Salamaua
